EmailTemplate.description: FTTA. Created for the email notification to owner that OGC Attorney has concurred with the agreement.
EmailTemplate.name: License Email notification to Owner - OGC Concurrence using HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: EPA File # {!EPA_Agreement__c.EPA_File_2__c} - OGC Concurrence
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!EPA_Agreement__c.Owner_Contact__c},
OGC concurs on EPA File # {!EPA_Agreement__c.00Nr0000001VPB9}.
To access the agreement, please click the below link.
{!EPA_Agreement__c.Link}
Thank you.
